Tags.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

valueType.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: AWS::RoboMaker::Robot resource creates an AWS RoboMaker Robot.

properties.name: Architecture
properties.description: The target architecture of the robot.

type.description: The target architecture of the robot.

properties.name: Fleet
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the fleet.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the fleet.

attributes.description: AWS::RoboMaker::Robot resource creates an AWS RoboMaker Robot.
